function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Sensitivity of the exposed model to user assumptions for occupant exposure and k-multiplier","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Verification and validation v&v of crowd models","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate representation of human movement in crowd models may lead to underestimation of disease transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for individual attributes in crowd models can result in higher exposure of vulnerable individuals","    category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Universal application of exposed to any pedestrian crowd models","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Use of exposed to simulate people movement during pandemics","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Application of exposed in informing building design and minimizing occupant exposure","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Retrofitting existing crowd models may lead to errors in occupant exposure assessments during pandemics.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on assumptions concerning disease transmissions may lead to inaccurate occupant exposure assessments.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Heavy dependence on existing crowd models and assumptions may limit the accuracy and applicability of the occupant exposure assessments.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Exposure time between 0 and 5 minutes for each individual agent to a given number of agents in the building","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Identifying the maximum number of people that agents are exposed to at the same time","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Average and standard deviations of the time of exposures to each number of people provide valuable information for quantitative risk assessment","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Exposure to contagious diseases due to contact with different numbers of agents in a built environment.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of clarity on exposure time calculation method","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unclear restrictions on building occupancy","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate information on maximum exposure time","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Occupant exposure in confined spaces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure by face-to-face contact within a social distance radius","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure by being in the same room","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Physical contact between pedestrians in confined risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure to contagious diseases through face-to-face contact within social distance radius","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Modelling assumption based on incomplete understanding of disease transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence on assumptions about disease transmission mechanisms","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Retrofitting existing microscopic crowd models without considering specific disease risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Reliance on macroscopic epidemiological models","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for individual mobility risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inconsistent social distancing recommendations in different countries","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of data to fully support
